system.description:
Make an INT check to prepare an herbal remedy you choose. If you fail, you can't make that remedy again until you successfully rest. Unused remedies expire in 3 rounds.

DC | Effect

11 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.class-abilities.Item.UzSmg3aLstFcNsUa]{Salve}. Heals 1 HP

12 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.class-abilities.Item.EhaA5tBROfrws1Kx]{Stimulant}. You can't be surprised for 10 rounds

13 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.class-abilities.Item.i8PZF77jaVDkCE6n]{Foebane}. You get ADV on attacks and damage against one creature type you choose for [[/r 1d6]] rounds

14 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.class-abilities.Item.3fck7HFRfDywsjQk]{Restorative}. Ends one poison or disease

15 | @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.class-abilities.Item.Ussun0GbRMiJZ8vP]{Curative}. Equivalent to a @UUID[Compendium.shadowdark.magic-items.jucTGEjsqJ1znHdf]{Potion of Healing}
